name: Restoration Kit
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Mimicking Cellular Oil" "154268" #L "Receptive Bots" "154266" #L "Shining Nano Knot of Restoration" "154270" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Mimicking Cellular Oil + Receptive Bots = #L "Purple Glowing Stim" "154274" Skills: | PT | ------------------------------ Shining Nano Knot of Restoration + Purple Glowing Stim = #L "Restoration Kit" "154272" Skills: | PT | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Very useful on the paper, recovering Nanopoints and Lifepoints... But ridiculously expensive, this recipe will cost you all your exploited credits...
